thread.title: Rose holds off Bjerregaard to win Hong Kong Open

author: Kin Cheung
title: Rose holds off Bjerregaard to win Hong Kong Open
text:
Rose holds off Bjerregaard to win Hong Kong Open Kin Cheung Justin Rose of England hits out of the bunker on the 9th hole during round 3   golf tournament in Hong Kong, Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015. (AP Photo/Kin Cheung) Kin Cheung As featured on
